title: TGA fines Pete Evans more than $25,000 after coronavirus claims
description: Celebrity chef Pete Evans is issued two infringement notices by the Therapeutic Goods Administration over claims he made about the BioCharger "hybrid subtle energy revitalisation platform".
content:
Updated 
April 24, 2020 18:44:25
Celebrity chef Pete Evans has been fined more than $25,000 by the Therapeutic Goods Administration (TGA) over claims he made about a product called a "BioCharger".
Key points:
